description: This file declares an interface and sample implementation for Bluetooth control functionalities within the WPEFramework. It defines classes, methods, and event notifications related to Bluetooth device management, discovery, pairing, and configuration, primarily intended for plugin support via JSON-RPC.

classes.name: JSONRPCImplementation
classes.description: Sample stub implementation class for Bluetooth control RPC methods, providing default response behavior.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers Bluetooth control methods and properties with a JSONRPC object.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters previously registered Bluetooth control methods and properties.
